bibl.title: Cleopatras.
bibl.note: The lives and careers of the royal women called Cleopatra (mythological as well as historical).
bibl.seg: London - New York, Routledge, 1994, 8°, x-243 pp. et 9 pll. ISBN 0-415-05806-6. £35.
The lives and careers of the royal women called Cleopatra (mythological as well as historical).

C.R. par Jean-Marie Bertrand, AntCl 64 (1995) p. 467. - Jakob Seibert, HZ 262 (1996) pp. 178-180. - H. Van Wees, GaR 42 (1995) p. 95. - Hermann Harrauer, BibO 56 (1999) coll. 654-656. - Corinne Bonnet, EtCl 71 (2003) pp. 308-309.
